item.title: NBA Salary Estimation
item.description: How much should Player X make? As I was searching for existing analyses, I came across Lewis Pipkin’s use of machine learning. I will address some mistakes I think he made in his analysis. “As per standard ML procedure”, he performed a test-train split on the data, then applied the model to his entire dataset (train AND test) to come up with “diagnoses”. The problem is… this ISN’T a standard supervised learning procedure.

item.title: About
item.description: I graduated with a BS in Statistics and Computer Science from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. I like applying knowledge of those fields to organize, understand, and communicate information in engaging ways. This will be a project portfolio, and a blog with data analyses, explanations of technical concepts, and opinions on life. Everything here is a living document - please let me know if you think I’m wrong. I’m on the job market!
